Key Match Events: The White Sox swept the series 3-0 against the Los Angeles Angels with a 7-0 win on September 26, 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: Fans were rooting for the team to avoid making history by becoming the losingest team in modern MLB history with a record-tying 120 losses.
Post-Match Reflections: The White Sox won 7-0 against the Angels, preventing them from making history with 121 losses.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a lightly-attended final home game of the season at Guaranteed Rate Field.
Others: Fans were excited to see the team win and celebrate, with some taking photos and others wearing White Sox gear.
